problems.title: Todo App with Filters & Persistence
problems.description: Build a todo app with add/edit/delete functionality, filtering by status (All, Active, Completed), and persistent state using localStorage.

problems.title: Infinite Scroll Product List
problems.description: Create a product list that loads more items on scroll using IntersectionObserver and fake API.

problems.title: Debounced Search with Suggestions
problems.description: Implement a search input with debounce and dropdown suggestions fetched from a fake API.

problems.title: Drag & Drop Task Board
problems.description: Build a Kanban-style task board with drag-and-drop functionality across columns.

problems.title: Accordion with Controlled State
problems.description: Create an accessible accordion component where only one section can be open at a time.

problems.title: Form Wizard with Validation
problems.description: Create a multi-step form wizard with form validation, back/next steps, and final review screen.

problems.title: Image Carousel
problems.description: Build an image carousel component with next/prev navigation, auto-play, and pause on hover.

problems.title: Live Character Counter
problems.description: Create a text input with a character counter that updates in real-time and shows red warning at limit.

problems.title: Sticky Table with Sorting & Pagination
problems.description: Build a table with sticky header, sortable columns, and client-side pagination.

problems.title: Theme Toggle (Light/Dark)
problems.description: Implement a light/dark theme switcher using React Context and CSS variables.
